## ğŸ“¦ Load Required Packages

```{r setup, include=TRUE}

library(gapminder)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

##ğŸ” Preview the Data
```{r}
head(gapminder)
summary(gapminder)
```

##ğŸ“Š Life Expectancy by Continent
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  group_by(continent) %>%
  summarise(avg_lifeExp = mean(lifeExp))
```

##ğŸ“ˆ Line Plot of Global Life Expectancy
```{r}

gapminder %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(mean_lifeExp = mean(lifeExp)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = mean_lifeExp)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue")
```

##ğŸ” GDP vs Life Expectancy
```{r}

ggplot(gapminder, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10()
```
